title: Torq Chemical Guys R Precision Power Rotary Polisher Kit - 9 Items
features: CORRECT PAINT WITH PRECISION & SPEED - Achieve paint perfection results like never before with the TORQ R Rotary Polisher! Built to be light, agile, and fast, the TORQ R is perfect for those detailers who spend hours behind the buffer, delivering comfort & control as you work!

DIGITAL RPM DISPLAY & CONTROLS - Accurately control the output of the 900w motor at every speed setting with the digital user interface! Easily toggle between 7 distinct speed settings and always know exactly the RPM of your tool so you’re always in perfect control!

ULTIMATE USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN - Polish in supreme comfort with the user-centered ergonomics and easy-to-use design of the TORQ R Rotary Polisher! Easily switch between backing plates with the advanced spindle lock backing plate design so you never have to worry about dropping your polisher!

VERSATILE POLISHING COMPOUNDS - The complete V-Line Polish System gives you 4 polishing compounds of varying cutting power so whether you’re cutting away deep scratches and imperfections or finishing off your paint to a deep shine, you’ll have exactly the right polish!

PREMIUM POLISHING PADS - With 3 premium Hex-Logic polishing pads you’re sure to have the right pad for any polishing job! Choose between the fan-favorite cutting, polishing, and finishing pads to correct and perfect your paintwork for perfect paint results on any finish!
description: Achieve the ultimate paint correction and perfection with precision, speed, and control with the TORQ R Precision Power Rotary Polisher Kit from Chemical Guys! Cut with total accuracy and comfort with the TORQ R Rotary Polisher and tackle all of your paint correction and perfection jobs with four versatile polishing compounds and three specialized polishing pads from the most trusted brand in car care!
